notifications.title: Insurance Not Honoring Approved Pre-authorization
notifications.message: Please contact the insurance desk regarding: Insurance Not Honoring Approved Pre-authorization
notifications.action_required: Immediately contact Red INsurance to clarify why the approved pre-authorization is not being honored and why no amount has been covered. Review the claim submission details against the pre-authorization conditions and approved procedures to identify any discrepancies or unmet requirements.

notifications.title: Financial Data Inconsistency
notifications.message: There is an inconsistency in the provided financial details: The Total Hospital Bill (₹400,000.00) minus the Amount Covered by Insurance (₹0.00) implies a patient responsibility of ₹400,000.00. However, the Patient's Balance is stated as ₹350,000.00. This discrepancy of ₹50,000.00 needs clarification.
notifications.action_required: Verify the exact patient responsibility and any payments already made by the patient or other sources to reconcile the total bill with the stated patient's balance.

notifications.title: Medication Order Pending Dispense
notifications.message: Your medication medication order pending dispense requires action.
notifications.action_required: Follow up immediately with the pharmacy to expedite the dispensing of Jondise.

notifications.title: New Discharge Medication Order Missing/Pending
notifications.message: Your medication new discharge medication order missing/pending requires action.
notifications.action_required: Initiate a pharmacy order for Insulin Glargine and ensure it is filled and dispensed prior to discharge.

notifications.title: Medication-Allergy Conflict Identified
notifications.message: Your medication medication-allergy conflict identified requires action.
notifications.action_required: Review the Dolo-Crosine prescription with the prescribing physician. Consider an alternative analgesic or a lower, liver-safe dosage with close monitoring of liver function.

notifications.title: Final Invoice Not Generated
notifications.message: There is a billing matter that needs your attention: The final invoice for patient P00231 has not yet been generated. Discharge cannot proceed without a finalized bill.
notifications.action_required: Generate the final invoice immediately and ensure all charges are accurately reflected. This is a critical blocker for discharge.

notifications.title: Required Chest X-Ray is Pending
notifications.message: Your required chest x-ray is pending needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Expedite completion of the Chest X-Ray and review results immediately.

notifications.title: Critical RBC Value in Complete Blood Count
notifications.message: Your critical rbc value in complete blood count needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Review RBC results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of low RBC may be necessary.

notifications.title: Critical Platelets Value in Complete Blood Count
notifications.message: Your critical platelets value in complete blood count needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Review Platelets results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of high Platelets may be necessary.

notifications.title: Critical Hemoglobin Value in Complete Blood Count
notifications.message: Your critical hemoglobin value in complete blood count needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Review Hemoglobin results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of low Hemoglobin may be necessary.
